Tooltip for reactable cell

dot-tip_reactable_cell.Rd

Tooltip for reactable cell

Usage

.tip_reactable_cell(
  string_values,
  row_names = NULL,
  unit_names = NULL,
  only_percent = FALSE
)

Arguments

string_values

String with values separated by '-'

row_names

Row names for tooltip

unit_names

Unit names for tooltip

only_percent

Logical, show only percent

Value

A shiny div with tippy tooltip
